tool_description: Creates Dublin Core metadata records from digital assets and provided descriptive information.

asset_path.description: Path to the digital asset for which to create Dublin Core metadata

creator.description: Creator or author of the asset

description.description: Description or abstract of the asset

error_messages: Asset not found: Verify the asset_path points to an existing file
Empty title: Title field cannot be empty
Invalid subject terms: Subject terms must be non-empty strings
Metadata extraction failed: Unable to extract technical metadata from asset
usage: Provide asset_path and title as minimum requirements. Add creator, description, and subject_terms for richer metadata. The tool automatically extracts technical metadata from the asset.

dublin_core_xml.description: Complete Dublin Core record in XML format

record_id.description: Unique identifier assigned to the metadata record

creation_date.description: Timestamp when the metadata record was created
